name: Zip Trip
description:
Zip trip is a Missile Command clone based on the artist "Barnett Newman".
Take command of 5 turrets and launch missiles against an onslaught of nukes.

As you play Barnett's painting will grow larger, drawing in more terrors until it succumbs the screen leading to an inevitable end.

(In Development - Still creating 2D/3D assets + audio implementation)
